descript.abstract: This polygon data layer represents municipalities for Waupaca County, Wisconsin in 2015. It is a feature class within the geodatabase, Waupaca_Municipalities_2015.gdb. [The data set represents the jurisdictional boundaries for the various units of local government within Waupaca County, Wisconsin. The data is represented using polygons stored in a Geodatabase. The data is updated annually.]
descript.purpose: This layer is intended for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. [The data serves as a reference for multiple uses. These uses include, but are not limited to; taxation, assessment, property locations, emergency response, regulation enforcement, and general mapping.]
descript.supplinf: Augmented original metadata with UW-Madison specific elements. Best available date of this dataset is 5/12/2015. For online dataset download, please visit http://www.co.waupaca.wi.us/landinformation/Data.aspx

Users must be aware of these conditions and bear responsibility for the appropriate use of the information with respect to possible errors, scale, resolution, rectification, positional accuracy, development methodology, time period, environmental and climatic conditions and other circumstances specific to these data. The user should refer to the accompanying metadata notes for a description of the data and data development procedures.]
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.0.4322

attracc.attraccr: Attribute information remains the same as given by the author of the data.

procstep.procdesc: Coverages were referenced to the original Waupaca County Coodinate System.
Inteligraphics converted original hand drawn paper parcel maps to ArcInfo Coverages.
Public Land Survey System (PLSS) coverages created using surveyor section summaries and GPS ground control coordinates (in WCCS).
City and Village boundaries created from various sources including original hand drawn parcel maps from Property listing and from legal descriptions created for the various municipalities.
Dataset converted to WICRS Waupaca Feet_US
Municipal boundary township lines created based on PLSS lines
Changed name of file from 'Municipal_Boundaries' to Waupaca_Municipalities_2015.

cntorgp.cntorg: Arthur H. Robinson Map Library, UW-Madison

procstep.procdesc: Exported original feature class into a new file geodatabase to maintain the original file format of the data and to conform with UW-Madison's data distribution plan.

cntorgp.cntorg: Arthur H. Robinson Map Library, UW-Madison

mapproj.mapprojn: NAD 1983 HARN WISCRS Waupaca County Feet

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
